A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought this was an awesome movie. The amount of erratic decisions made it seem so different than the others. It was very unique and broke most of the binds that I think are set in place by looking to hit a specific set of character arks. As far as just a movie I think its wonderful\, the audio is as amazing as always\, combat was grate\, and the plot was solid.
